import React from 'react' import data from '../data' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function HomeScreen(props) { return (
    {data.products.map(product=>
  • {product.name}
    {product.brand}
    ${product.price}
    {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReiews} Reviews)
    • ) }
) }
